DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study assess glucose response human rice sample prepared high amylose rice ( high amylose rice 1 high amylose rice 2 ) , compare conventional rice glucose test beverage . Study Design : The propose study randomize single-blind crossover design repeat measure use human subject ( clinical study ) . Treatment : The amount resistant starch , type dietary fiber , great high amylose variety rice conventional variety rice . High amylose rice commercially produce Louisiana Arkansas , USA . This specific rice breed contain amylose ordinary ( conventional ) rice . This food genetically modify . Brief Methods : Study subject ( men woman ) age 18-40 year old recruit UH-Manoa campus Honolulu area via flyer . Interested individual screen telephone initial eligibility ( nonsmoker , non-vegetarian , habitual breakfast eater , able fast 12 hour , available 7:00am-10:00 weekday , willing participate study ) . Based initial phone screening , eligible study subject attend enrollment visit complete consent form , obtain study material , confirm health status eligibility base subject inclusion exclusion criterion . Individuals meet study eligibility record destroy . 18 healthy subject ( 9 men 9 woman ) attend 4 morning study visit RMATRIX CRC The Queens Medical Center . Subjects complete 24-hour food record 24 hour prior study visit . Subjects fast 12 hour time study visit . Upon arrival , subject IV inserted serial blood draw , fast blood sample obtain ( time = 0 ) . Subjects present one four treatment random order : high amylose rice-1 , high amylose rice-2 , conventional rice glucose beverage . Subjects instructed consume sample beverage within 15 minute . Blood sample take 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 , 120 minute . Subjects complete appetite survey blood draw . Upon completion study visit , subject offer snack juice monitor safety . Study staff : A graduate research assistant Nutrition graduate program coordinate clinical study . Undergraduate research assistant assist study visit . All student work Dr. Stewart 's supervision . All study staff complete UHM biosafety training , UMH blood borne pathogens training , UMH NIH human subject train . Clinical Support : The study support nursing staff RMATRIX PCR perform IV catheter insertion , collect serial blood sample monitor adverse event .
DOC.criteria: Gender : male female Age 1840 year old In good general health Habitual breakfast eater Able fast 12 hour Available 7:00am9:30am weekday Willing participate study complete 4 study visit within 6week period Capable give informed consent Current smoker BMI > 30 kg/m2 Current use medication alter appetite ( antidepressant , antibiotic , weight loss medication , appetite suppressant ) Current use medication control blood glucose , insulin insulin receptor History prediabetes , diabetes , hyperglycemia , hyperinsulinemia , gastrointestinal disease surgery , eat disorder Food allergy kind Vegetarian For female , pregnancy ( current within past 6 month ) lack regular menstrual cycle . History bleed clot disorder ( e.g . hemophilia , thrombocytopenia , Vitamin K deficiency , liver failure ) Current use medication supplement may interfere clot prolong bleed time ( e.g . aspirin , NSAIDS , coumadin , anticoagulant therapy , herbal supplement include , limited curcumin flavonoid ) Problems vascular access difficulty tolerate blood draw
